text: FXX is a Turkish pay television channel owned by Warner Bros. Discovery EMEA. The channel was originally launched as the Turkish version of Discovery Home & Health on 29 July 2007. The channel started broadcasting in 16:9 aspect ratio on 1 April 2016. On 29 May 2024, Warner Bros. Discovery EMEA announced that the Turkish version of Discovery Home & Health would be relaunched as FXX on 17 July 2024. == Logos == file:Discovery H&H.png;|10 September 2011-17 July 2024 file:FXX Logo.svg|17 July 2024-present Category:Television channels in Europe
title: FXX (Turkish TV channel)
